item.title: United Nations in the Contemporary World
item.description: UN has been a pioneering multilateral global body for the last 74 years in the area of humanitarian response, aiding the member states, preventing conflicts, maintaining peace and security.UN has been underrepresented, non-inclusive, and structurally partial in the exercise and powers in the decision making especially in its organ, the...

item.title: Possible US-Iran conflict and its impacts on Nepal
item.description: Have you ever thought about the impacts of the US-Iran conflict on Nepal? The Islamic Republic of Iran and the US have been hostile since the advent of the Iranian Revolution which led to dethrone of US-backed Monarch Mohammad Reza Shah Pahlavi and the start of the theocratic rule of...
